description: Having read Kuroneko`s fan fiction online, Kirino decides to write some of her own. But in order to get material, and get into the right mood for writing, she drags Kyousuke around the city on Christmas Eve... but this isn`t a date, right?

titles.title: Ma petite sœur ne peut pas être une aussi bonne écrivaine
Ore no Imouto ga Konna ni Shousetsuka na Wake ga Nai
There`s No Way My Little Sister Can Write a Novel
俺の妹がこんなに小説家なわけがない
